spell.name: Fiendish Transformation
entries: You call upon forth the fiendish power of the Lower Planes to transform yourself. You gain the following benefits until the spell ends:

items.name: Nefarious Hull
entries: You are immune to fire and poison damage and the {@condition poisoned} condition. Each time a creature hits you with a melee attack, they take {@damage 1d12} fire damage.

items.name: Profane Weapons
entries: Choose between fire, cold and poison damage. Your weapons attacks deals an extra {@damage 2d10} damage of the type you chose.

items.name: Wings
entries: Red bat or feather wings sprout from your back, giving you a flying speed of 45 feet.

items.name: Imposing Presence
entries: You gain an bonus to all Charisma Ability Checks equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

components.m: a statuette of a fiend, worth at least 500 gp
